name: Under Pressure (itch) (dorona, PaulaLucas, mf220)
description:
Jeffrey Lighthouse and Bevan Alfresco have to repair the windows on their sinking ship - trying to build a ladder to escape! Will you sabotage your friend to let water in faster on their side or leave them be!?

In order to survive, you need to collect 6 wooden planks and build a ladder by combining them with the rope in your room. Repair the leaking windows to slow down the ever-rising water level or use the button to break extra windows on the other player's side.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2020 over 48 hours.
